Author: SpheneDev
Name: Sphene
Description: Through the power of Living Memory, this plugin harmonizes your Penumbra modifications and Glamourer configurations across all connected souls, ensuring endless synchronization in your shared digital realm.
Punchline: Become Endless. Return to Living Memory.
Changelog:
- New Feature: Public City & Area Bound Syncshells
 - Added Public City Syncshells available in Limsa Lominsa, New Gridania, and Ul'dah
 - Players can choose to join or ignore Public Syncshells when entering a city for the first time
 - Added option to disable future Public Syncshell join prompts
 - Added rule acceptance before joining Public Syncshells
 - Automatic reconnect when re-entering a city area
 - Auto-join behavior can be toggled in settings
 - Added Area Bound Syncshells for housing plots, interiors, and private rooms
 - Only owners or housing members can create Area Bound Syncshells
 - Added optional welcome page with custom banner and greeting
 - Added customizable rules and entry permissions for Area Bound Syncshells
 - Added auto-join user limit setting (up to 200)
 - Area Bound Syncshells automatically remove users when leaving the area
 - Added toggle to activate or deactivate Area Syncshells
 - Area binding deactivation removes all currently joined users
 - Prevented non-owners from creating Syncshells on other players' plots
 - Added event support through Sphene Team-requested Area Syncshells

 - New Feature: Sphene Theme System
 - Added full client theme customization support
 - Added ability to save, load, and share themes with other users
 - Each window now follows the chosen theme except the Sphene Control Panel
 - Added right-click context menu to Sphene icon listing installed plugins
 - Context menu currently supports Penumbra, Glamourer, Simple Heals, Livepose, Customize+, Honorific, Moodles, PetNicknames and Brio
 - Removed Panel Lock Width due to scaling issues in Dalamud
